ED S 320.title: Elementary Science Teaching Methods
ED S 320.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED S 320.description: An application of research and theory to classroom practice in the teaching of science.

ED S 321.title: Secondary Science Methods
ED S 321.prereq_description: Admission to Single Subject Teaching Credential Program; and consent of
ED S 321.description: Development of pedagogical content knowledge, methods, curriculum design, research, and theory related to teaching and learning Science at the secondary level.

ED S 321M.title: Secondary Science Methods
ED S 321M.prereq_description: Admission to Single Subject Teaching Credential Program; and consent of
ED S 321M.description: Development of pedagogical content knowledge, methods, curriculum design, research, and theory related to teaching and learning science at the secondary level.

ED S 341.title: Student Teaching: Science Secondary
ED S 341.prereq_description: Admission to Single Subject Teaching Credential Program; and consent of instructor.
ED S 341.description: Supervised fieldwork and student teaching in secondary Science classrooms (grades 7-12).

ED S 371.title: Professional Issues in Teaching Science: Secondary
ED S 371.prereq_description: Admission to Single Subject Teaching Credential Program; and consent of
ED S 371.description: Seminar in which teacher candidates in Science share and discuss their field experience, explore further avenues of teaching content, and investigate more effective ways of engaging and supporting students.
